title.oldValue: Office for Windows: support scoping labels based on files vs. emails
title.newValue: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Within 4 hours option for notifications.

description.oldValue:
,Word, Excel, PowerPoint clients and Outlook email clients will support admin setting to have different set of sensitivity labels.
GA date: March CY2023
Preview date: February CY2023
description.newValue: ,We are adding a new within 4 hours option to end user notifications, allowing users to be able to rely on prompt notification about quarantined items when appropriate. Â With this feature users can be rest assured that they will be updated frequently once new items land in their quarantined folders.
